        // å°†ä¸¤ç§è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼çš„å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘åˆå¹¶åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•

        // å£°æ˜è§†å›¾åç§°
        String viewName = "index";

        processTemplate(viewName, request, response);

                                                                          # â‘¤å®ç°ï¼šå®Œæˆç™»å½•æ“ä½œ

                                                                          protected void doLogin(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

    // 1.ä»è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°ä¸­è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
    String username = request.getParameter("username");
    String password = request.getParameter("password");

    // 2.å°è£…ä¸ºUserå¯¹è±¡
    User userForm = new User(null, username, password, null);

    // 3.è°ƒç”¨UserServiceçš„æ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œç™»å½•éªŒè¯
    try {
        User userDB = userService.doLogin(userForm);

        // 4.ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸåè·³è½¬åˆ°ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸé¡µé¢
        response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/UserServlet?method=toLoginSuccessPage");
    } catch (Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();

        // 5.ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥åˆ™æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯
        // â‘ å°†ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥çš„æç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯å­˜å…¥è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
        request.setAttribute("message", e.getMessage());

        // â‘¡æ‰§è¡Œç™»å½•é¡µé¢çš„æ¨¡æ¿æ¸²æŸ“
        String viewName = "user/login";

        processTemplate(viewName, request, response);
    }

}

                                                                          # â‘£å®ç°ï¼šå®Œæˆæ³¨å†Œæ“ä½œ

                                                                          protected void doRegister(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
    // 1.ä»è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°ä¸­è·å–æ•°æ®å°è£…ä¸ºUserå¯¹è±¡
    String username = request.getParameter("username");
    String password = request.getParameter("password");
    String email = request.getParameter("email");

    User userForm = new User(null, username, password, email);

    // 2.è°ƒç”¨UserServiceçš„æ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œæ³¨å†Œ
    try {
        userService.doRegister(userForm);

        // 3.å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸é‚£ä¹ˆå°±è·³è½¬åˆ°æ³¨å†ŒæˆåŠŸçš„é¡µé¢
        // é€‰æ‹©é‡å®šå‘çš„åŸå› ï¼šè·³è½¬åˆ°regist_success.htmlé¡µé¢åï¼Œç”¨æˆ·åˆ·æ–°æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸ä¼šé‡å¤æäº¤æ³¨å†Œè¡¨å•
        response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath()+"/UserServlet?method=toRegisterSuccessPage");
    } catch (Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();

        // 4.å¦‚æœæŠ›å‡ºäº†å¼‚å¸¸
        request.setAttribute("message", e.getMessage());

        String viewName = "user/regist";

        processTemplate(viewName, request, response);
    }
}

                                                                          protected void showBookList(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

    // 1.è°ƒç”¨Serviceæ–¹æ³•æŸ¥è¯¢å›¾ä¹¦åˆ—è¡¨
    List<Book> bookList = bookService.getBookList();

    // 2.å°†å›¾ä¹¦åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®å­˜å…¥è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
    request.setAttribute("bookList", bookList);

    // 3.æ‰§è¡Œè§†å›¾æ¨¡æ¿æ¸²æŸ“
    String viewName = "manager/book_manager";

    processTemplate(viewName, request, response);

}

                                                                          # â‘£å®ç°ï¼šBookService.getBookList()

                                                                              @Override
    public List<Book> getBookList() {
        return bookDao.selectBookList();
    }

                                                                          # â‘¤å®ç°ï¼šBookDao.selectBookList()

                                                                          @Override
public List<Book> selectBookList() {

    String sql = "select book_id bookId, book_name bookName, author, price, sales, stock, img_path imgPath from t_book order by book_Id desc";

    return getBeanList(Book.class, sql);
}

                                                                          # â‘¢å®ç°ï¼šBookManagerServlet.removeBook()

                                                                          protected void removeBook(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

    // 1.ä»è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°ä¸­è·å–bookId
    String bookId = request.getParameter("bookId");

    // 2.è°ƒç”¨Serviceæ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œåˆ é™¤
    bookService.removeBook(bookId);

    // 3.é‡å®šå‘åˆ°æ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ—è¡¨åŠŸèƒ½
    response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/BookManagerServlet?method=showBookList");

}

    }

                                                                          # â‘¤å®ç°ï¼šBookDao.deleteBook()

                                                                              @Override
    public void deleteBook(String bookId) {
        String sql = "delete from t_book where book_id=?";

        update(sql, bookId);
    }

    <input type="hidden" name="method" value="saveBook" />
    <input type="text" name="bookName" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥åç§°"/>
    <input type="number" name="price" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ä»·æ ¼"/>
    <input type="text" name="author" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½œè€…"/>
    <input type="number" name="sales" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥é”€é‡"/>
    <input type="number" name="stock" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥åº“å­˜"/>

                                                                          # â‘¤å®ç°ï¼šBookManagerServlet.saveBook()

                                                                          protected void saveBook(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

    // 1.è·å–è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°
    String bookName = request.getParameter("bookName");
    String price = request.getParameter("price");
    String author = request.getParameter("author");
    String sales = request.getParameter("sales");
    String stock = request.getParameter("stock");

    // 2.å°è£…å¯¹è±¡

    // â€»imgPathæŒ‰è¯´åº”è¯¥é€šè¿‡æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ çš„æ–¹å¼æä¾›ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç°åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæŠ€æœ¯è¿˜æ²¡å­¦
    // æ‰€ä»¥æš‚æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå›ºå®šå€¼
    String imgPath = "static/uploads/mi.jpg";

    Book book = new Book(null, bookName, author, Double.parseDouble(price), Integer.parseInt(sales), Integer.parseInt(stock), imgPath);

    // 3.è°ƒç”¨Serviceæ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œä¿å­˜
    bookService.saveBook(book);

    // 4.é‡å®šå‘åˆ°æ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢
    response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/BookManagerServlet?method=showBookList");
}

                                                                          # â‘¥å®ç°ï¼šBookService.saveBook()

                                                                              @Override
    public void saveBook(Book book) {
        bookDao.insertBook(book);
    }

                                                                          # â‘¦å®ç°ï¼šBookDao.insertBook()

                                                                          @Override
public void insertBook(Book book) {
    String sql = "insert  into `t_book`(`book_name`,`author`,`price`,`sales`,`stock`,`img_path`) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)";

    update(sql, book.getBookName(), book.getAuthor(), book.getPrice(), book.getSales(), book.getStock(), book.getImgPath());
}

                                                                          # 6ã€ä¿®æ”¹å›¾ä¹¦åŠŸèƒ½

                                                                          # â‘ æ€è·¯

                                                                          book_manager.htmlâ†’ä¿®æ”¹å›¾ä¹¦è¶…é“¾æ¥â†’BookManagerServlet.toEditPage()â†’book_edit.htmlï¼ˆè¡¨å•å›æ˜¾ï¼‰

                                                                          book_edit.htmlâ†’æäº¤è¡¨å•â†’BookManagerServlet.updateBook()â†’é‡å®šå‘æ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ—è¡¨åŠŸèƒ½

                                                                          # â‘¢å®ç°ï¼šBookManagerServlet.toEditPage()

                                                                          protected void toEditPage(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

    // 1.ä»è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°ä¸­è·å–bookId
    String bookId = request.getParameter("bookId");

    // 2.æ ¹æ®bookIdæŸ¥è¯¢å¯¹åº”çš„Bookå¯¹è±¡
    Book book = bookService.getBookById(bookId);

    // 3.æŠŠBookå¯¹è±¡å­˜å…¥è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
    request.setAttribute("book", book);

    // 4.æ¸²æŸ“è§†å›¾
    String viewName = "manager/book_edit";

    processTemplate(viewName, request, response);

}

                                                                          # â‘£å®ç°ï¼šBookService.getBookById()

                                                                              @Override
    public Book getBookById(String bookId) {
        return bookDao.selectBookByPrimaryKey(bookId);
    }

                                                                          # â‘¤å®ç°ï¼šBookDao.selectBookByPrimaryKey()

                                                                          @Override
public Book selectBookByPrimaryKey(String bookId) {

    String sql = "select book_id bookId, book_name bookName, author, price, sales, stock, img_path imgPath from t_book where book_id=?";

    return getBean(Book.class, sql, bookId);
}

                                                                          # â‘¥å®ç°ï¼šbook_edit.htmlï¼ˆè¡¨å•å›æ˜¾ï¼‰

                                                                          <form action="BookManagerServlet" method="post">
    <input type="hidden" name="method" value="updateBook" />
    <input type="text" name="bookName" th:value="${book.bookName}" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥åç§°"/>
    <input type="number" name="price" th:value="${book.price}" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ä»·æ ¼"/>
    <input type="text" name="author" th:value="${book.author}" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½œè€…"/>
    <input type="number" name="sales" th:value="${book.sales}" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥é”€é‡"/>
    <input type="number" name="stock" th:value="${book.stock}" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥åº“å­˜"/>

    <button class="btn">æ›´æ–°</button>

                                                                          # â‘¦å®ç°ï¼šBookManagerServlet.updateBook()

                                                                          protected void updateBook(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

    // 1.è·å–è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°
    String bookId = request.getParameter("bookId");
    String bookName = request.getParameter("bookName");
    String price = request.getParameter("price");
    String author = request.getParameter("author");
    String sales = request.getParameter("sales");
    String stock = request.getParameter("stock");

    // 2.å°è£…å¯¹è±¡
    Book book = new Book(Integer.parseInt(bookId), bookName, author, Double.parseDouble(price), Integer.parseInt(sales), Integer.parseInt(stock), null);

    // 3.è°ƒç”¨Serviceæ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œæ›´æ–°
    bookService.updateBook(book);

    // 4.æ¸²æŸ“è§†å›¾
    response.sendRedirect(request.getContextPath() + "/BookManagerServlet?method=showBookList");
}

                                                                          # â‘§å®ç°ï¼šBookService.updateBook()

                                                                              @Override
    public void updateBook(Book book) {
        bookDao.updateBook(book);
    }

                                                                          # â‘¨å®ç°ï¼šBookDao.updateBook()

                                                                          æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™é‡Œä¸ä¿®æ”¹imgPathå­—æ®µ

                                                                          @Override
public void updateBook(Book book) {
    String sql = "update t_book set book_name=?, author=?, price=?, sales=?, stock=? where book_id=?";

    update(sql, book.getBookName(), book.getAuthor(), book.getPrice(), book.getSales(), book.getStock(), book.getBookId());
}

                                                                          # äº”ã€å‰å°å›¾ä¹¦å±•ç¤º

                                                                          # 1ã€æ€è·¯

                                                                          index.htmlâ†’PortalServlet.doPost()â†’æŠŠå›¾ä¹¦åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºæ¥â†’æ¸²æŸ“è§†å›¾â†’é¡µé¢è¿­ä»£æ˜¾ç¤ºå›¾ä¹¦æ•°æ®

                                                                          # 2ã€å®ç°ï¼šPortalServlet.doPost()

                                                                          public class PortalServlet extends ViewBaseServlet {

    private BookService bookService = new BookServiceImpl();

    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

        // å°†ä¸¤ç§è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼çš„å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘åˆå¹¶åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•
        doPost(request, response);
    }

    protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

        // æŸ¥è¯¢å›¾ä¹¦åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®
        List<Book> bookList = bookService.getBookList();

        // å°†å›¾ä¹¦åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®å­˜å…¥è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
        request.setAttribute("bookList", bookList);

        // å£°æ˜è§†å›¾åç§°
        String viewName = "index";

        // è§£ææ¨¡æ¿è§†å›¾
        processTemplate(viewName, request, response);

    }

}
